Class Invoice

  • java.lang.Object
    • Invoice

  • public class Invoice
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a bill calculated from an array of Item objects

    2019-09-21
    Author:
    Dean Willavoys - 105003751

      • validateNumItems

        private int validateNumItems(int num)
        Ensures that the number of items specified by the user is a valid amount, returns 0 if not
        Parameters:
        num - Integer entered by the user
        Returns:
        int Returns num parameter if valid, 0 otherwise

      • out

        public void out()

      • calcTotal

        private double calcTotal(Item[] items,
                         int numItems)
        Calculates the total cost of Items in items array before applying tax
        Parameters:
        items - Item object array, non-empty
        numItems - Integer number of items in the items array, greater than 0
        Returns:
        double The summation of the costs of the objects

      • interest

        private double interest(double val,
                        double rate)
        Calculates what 6.25% of the passed double is
        Parameters:
        val - A double to find 6.25% of
        rate - A double representing interest rate, greater than zero
        Returns:
        double Returns 6.25% of val

      • doubleFormat

        private java.lang.String doubleFormat(double num)
        Formats the passed integer so that it returns with 2 decimal points of precision, in String format
        Parameters:
        num - A double to be formatted
        Returns:
        String Returns the formatted double in String form
